  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109890</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Meselsohn and Stahl experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meselsohn und Stahl Experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience de Meselsohn et de Stahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência de Meselsohn e de Stahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento di Stahl e di Meselsohn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Meselsohn και πείραμα Stahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de Meselsohn y de Stahl</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the results of Meselsohn and Stahl's experiment on Escherichia coli that provided the evidence for the semi-conservative replication of DNA</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">DNA semi-conservative replication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Meselsohn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Stahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Resultate Meselsohn und
Stahls des Experimentes auf Escherichia Coli, die den Beweis für die 
halb-konservative Reproduktion von DNA zur Verfügung stellte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les résultats de 
l'expérience de Meselsohn et de Stahl sur Escherichia coli qui a 
fourni l'évidence pour la réplique de semi-finale-conservative de 
l'ADN</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os resultados da 
experiência de Meselsohn e de Stahl nos escherichia coli que 
forneceram a evidência para o replication semi-conservador do DNA</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i risultati 
dell'esperimento dello Stahl e di Meselsohn su Escherichia coli che ha
fornito la prova per la replica di semi-conservatore di DNA</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα αποτελέσματα του 
πειράματος Meselsohn και Stahl σε Escherichia coli που 
παρείχε τα στοιχεία για την ημι-συντηρητική αντένσταση του DNA</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los resultados del 
experimento de Meselsohn y de Stahl en los escherichia coli que 
proporcionaron a la evidencia para la réplica semi-conservadora de la
DNA</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">DNA halb-konservative Reproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Escherichia Coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meselsohn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réplique d'ADN semi-finale-conservative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Meselsohn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Replication semi-conservador do DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημι-συντηρητική αντένσταση DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
